question.text: You must NOT sound your horn

explanation.text:
Vehicles can be noisy. Every effort must be made to prevent excessive noise, especially in built-up areas at night. Don’t
• rev the engine
• sound the horn
unnecessarily. It is illegal to sound your horn in a built-up area between 11.30 pm and 7 am, except when another vehicle poses a danger.

answer.text: between 10 pm and 6 am in a built-up area
at any time in a built-up area
